title: Woman uses eye drops to poison lover, steals idea from 'Wedding Crashers' movie. Is justice served?
itunes:title: Woman uses eye drops to poison lover, steals idea from 'Wedding Crashers' movie. Is justice served?
description:
Over three days, Lana Clayton laces her husband's drinks with eye drops, mimicking a scene from the movie, "Wedding Crashers."

Millionaire Steven Clayton died painfully, with no way to call for help. The former nurse pleaded guilty to voluntary manslaughter and tampering with a food or drug. What is her sentence?

Joining Nancy Grace today to discuss the case:

  • Jason Oshins: New York Defense Attorney
  • Cloyd Steiger: 36 years with Seattle Police Department, 22-year homicide detective & author of "Seattle's Forgotten Serial Killer: Gary Gene Grant" 
  • Joe Scott Morgan: Forensics expert, Professor of Forensics at Jacksonville State University & author of "Blood Beneath My Feet"
  • Caryn Stark: NYC Psychologist 
  • Kristi O'Connor: Reporter for WBTV Charlotte

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
